text: Eddie Marcos Melo Afonso (born 7 March 1994) is an Angolan footballer who plays for Petro de Luanda and the Angola national football team. ==International career== Afonso made his senior international debut on 17 January 2016 in a 0-1 home loss against Cameroon for the Africa Nations Championship. ==References== ==External links== * *Zerozero.pt profile Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Atlético Petróleos de Luanda players Category:C.R.D. Libolo players Category:Girabola players Category:Angolan footballers Category:Angola international footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Sportspeople from Luanda Category:2019 Africa Cup of Nations players
title: Eddie Afonso
